text: the nice thing that i forced Clawdbot to read it docs and it come up with this and enable it by himself
Koristite Codex ako koristite Clawdbot, eto resio sam vam  i to
I gave Clawdbot access to my body. Now it’s controlling me, so that I don’t need to control myself anymore. It uses my body to do everything for me, and I just exist.
Use both. Clawdbot automates my Mac, Claude Code writes apps. Not either/or.

昨天晚上测试了在amazon aws上部署Clawdbot/Moltbot

一直到用到现在都很稳定，而且响应速度也快，关键是免费。

#Clawdbot #Moltbot

It just didn’t merge into their workflow naturally . I think the new trend is the wrapper of existing claude code/codex, like Clawdbot Claude Cowork etc. 

Distribution is hard

CLAWDBOT → MOLTBOT: Status Log [82h in]

Finally got it semi-working. 
Turns out: GPT-4o-mini is fine for narrow tasks,
but awful as a central brain. 

Switched to Claude Haiku —
 better coherence
 lower token burn
 handles “ambient memory” stuff way better

Still
